word:
MR No. 853 - Ellen G. White and Her Last Four Books

     I am thankful that I can remain at home for a time, where I can be close to my helpers . . . I have been very fully employed in the preparation of matter for the Life of Paul. We are trying to bring out scriptural evidence of truth, and these, we believe, will be appreciated by our people.--Letter 4, 1911.
